subject: INVITATION: Holiday Party - Family Programs 15 DEC
bodyPreview: You and your family are cordially invited to the Annual General Officer Holiday Reception hosted by the Installation Commander at the Officers' Club on 15 December from 1800-2100 hours. This festive event brings together senior leaders and their families for an evening of celebration, networking, and holiday cheer.

body.content:
üéÑ You're Invited! üéÑ

Annual General Officer Holiday Reception

Dear General Officer and Family,

You are cordially invited to join us for the Annual General Officer Holiday Reception, a cherished tradition that brings together senior leaders and their families for an evening of celebration, networking, and holiday cheer.

üìÖ Date:Sunday, 15 December 2025
‚è∞ Time:1800 - 2100 Hours (6:00 PM - 9:00 PM)
üìç Location:Fort Myer Officers' Club
204 Lee Avenue
Fort Myer, VA 22211
View Map
üëî Dress Code:Mess Dress / Formal Evening Attire
(Officers: Mess Dress or Dress Blue uniform; Civilians: Formal attire)
üé´ RSVP:By 8 December 2025

About the Event:

This elegant holiday reception has been a Pentagon tradition for over 50 years, providing an opportunity for General Officers from all services to gather in a relaxed, festive atmosphere. It's a wonderful chance to strengthen professional relationships, meet colleagues' families, and celebrate the season together.

Event Highlights:

  • üçΩÔ∏è Gourmet Buffet Dinner
    • Carved prime rib and honey-glazed ham
    • Fresh seafood station (shrimp, oysters, crab cakes)
    • International cuisine selections
    • Extensive salad bar and sides
    • Vegetarian and gluten-free options available
  • üç∞ Dessert Display
    • Holiday-themed pastries and cakes
    • Chocolate fountain with fresh fruit
    • Seasonal pies and cookies
    • Coffee and specialty beverages
  • üç∑ Premium Open Bar
    • Wine, beer, spirits, and cocktails
    • Non-alcoholic beverages and mocktails
    • Champagne toast at 2030 hours
  • üéµ Live Entertainment
    • U.S. Army Jazz Ensemble (1800-1930)
    • DJ with holiday music and dancing (1930-2100)
    • The U.S. Army Voices holiday performance (2000)
  • üéÖ Family Activities
    • Visit with Santa Claus (1800-1930) - children welcome!
    • Professional photos with holiday backdrop
    • Kids' crafts corner
    • Gift bags for children
  • üéÅ Door Prizes & Raffles
    • Luxury gift baskets
    • Resort weekend getaway packages
    • Electronics and gift certificates
    • All proceeds benefit Army Emergency Relief

Special Guests:

We are honored to announce that the following distinguished guests will be in attendance:

  • General Randy A. George, Chief of Staff of the Army
  • Sergeant Major of the Army Michael R. Weimer
  • The Honorable Christine Wormuth, Secretary of the Army
  • Service Chiefs from Joint Staff
  • Senior DoD civilian leadership

Program Itinerary:

1745 - 1800Guest Arrival & Registration
Coat check available
1800 - 1830Reception & Cocktail Hour
Appetizers and networking
1830 - 1845Welcome Remarks
Installation Commander, MG Thompson
1845 - 1900Invocation & Remembrance
Honoring fallen comrades and deployed soldiers
1900 - 2000Dinner Service
Buffet-style, multiple serving stations
2000 - 2015U.S. Army Voices Holiday Performance
Traditional carols and patriotic songs
2015 - 2030Dessert & Coffee Service
2030 - 2035Champagne Toast
Led by the Chief of Staff
2035 - 2100Dancing & Socializing
Door prize drawings throughout
2100Event Concludes

RSVP Information:

To help us plan appropriately for catering and seating, please RSVP by 8 December 2025.

To RSVP:

  • Reply to this email with number of guests attending
  • Call Rebecca Harrison at (703) 696-XXXX
  • Complete online form: armymwr.com/holiday-rsvp-2025

Please indicate:

  • Total number of adults attending
  • Total number of children attending (ages please)
  • Any dietary restrictions or allergies
  • Accessible seating needs

Parking & Transportation:

  • Parking: Complimentary valet parking available at the Officers' Club
  • Shuttle Service: Courtesy shuttle from Pentagon parking lots (departing 1700-1745, returning 2100-2130)
  • Security: Fort Myer installation access required - have valid military ID or RSVP confirmation
  • Rideshare Drop-off: Designated area at club entrance

Lodging Information:

For out-of-town guests, the following hotels offer military rates:

  • Fort Myer Guest House - On installation, walking distance
    Reservations: (703) 696-3576 | $95/night
  • Marriott Pentagon City - 2 miles
    Reservations: (703) 413-5500 | Military rate available
  • Hilton Arlington - 3 miles
    Reservations: (703) 528-6000 | Military rate available

What to Expect:

This is a formal but festive affair. While the atmosphere is elegant, it's also warm and family-friendly. Many officers bring their spouses and children for the early portion of the evening (Santa visit, dinner, and entertainment). Some families depart before the dancing begins, while others stay for the full event.

Gifts & Donations:

Gifts are not expected. However, if you wish to support our soldiers and their families, we encourage donations to Army Emergency Relief (AER). A donation table will be available at the event, or you can donate online at www.armyemergencyrelief.org.

Photography:

  • Professional photographer will be present for formal photos
  • Photos with Santa available for families
  • Holiday backdrop photo station
  • All photos will be available for download (free) within 3 days of event
  • Social media hashtag: #ArmyHoliday2025

COVID-19 & Health Protocols:

We are committed to the health and safety of all guests. Current health protection measures will be in place consistent with DoD and local guidelines. Updates will be provided as the event approaches.

Questions or Special Accommodations:

If you have questions or require special accommodations (dietary, accessibility, childcare), please contact:

Event Coordinator:Ms. Rebecca Harrison
Family Programs Director
Phone: (703) 696-XXXX
Email: rebecca.harrison@mwr.army.mil
Protocol Office:LTC Mark Stevens
Phone: (703) 692-XXXX
Email: mark.stevens@hqda.army.mil

We Look Forward to Celebrating With You!

The holiday season is a time to reflect on the year's accomplishments, honor our military family, and look forward to the opportunities ahead. This reception is our way of saying thank you for your leadership and dedication to the Army and our nation.

Please join us for what promises to be a memorable evening of fellowship, celebration, and holiday spirit!

üéÑ Season's Greetings üéÑ

"Leadership is the art of giving people a platform for spreading ideas that work." ‚Äî Seth Godin

Warmest regards,

Rebecca Harrison
Director, Family and Morale, Welfare & Recreation Programs
U.S. Army Family Programs
Office: (703) 696-XXXX
Mobile: (703) 555-XXXX
rebecca.harrison@mwr.army.mil

On behalf of MG Thompson, Installation Commander, and the entire Fort Myer community

Event Code: GO-HOLIDAY-2025
RSVP Deadline: 8 December 2025
Questions? Call (703) 696-XXXX
Classification: UNCLASSIFIED

This is an official U.S. Army Family Programs event. No-host bar proceeds support Army Emergency Relief.
